notes: Axiom, Nova, Terminal(Padre) are best if you want to stay ahead
Phantom/DEX is mostly for beginners or someone willing to invest long term

phantomToAxiom: Open Chrome (mobile or desktop) and go to Axiom
Buy SOL on Phantom or buy on Coinbase and send to Phantom, then transfer to Axiom
setup.mobileTip: If you are on mobile: bottom right says advanced strategy and you can set TP and SL
fundingNotes: Apple Pay is used (via Phantom providers like MoonPay)
Robinhood/Coinbase may require waiting before SOL can be sent (new accounts)
Always keep extra SOL for fees (selling may fail if you don‚Äôt)

commonIssue.fix: Add a small amount of SOL for fees

axiomCoreRule.reason: Discover is trending; Pulse is what you want for finding coins and using filters

playbook.title: PAID DEGEN PLAYBOOK (SYSTEM)
principles: Avoid rushing, start with what you can afford
Focus on stacking 2x‚Äôs early to build portfolio
Never let a coin drop 50% on you; don‚Äôt hold on hopium

marketCaps.earlyRisk: 20k-100k are risky but if they run you can make a lot of money
marketCaps.preferredBeginnerRange: 20k-40k higher chance for at least a 2x
thousandsVsMillions: Both are fine; depends on community hype and transactions
If transactions seem low/dead, best not to ape
Buying in mills can still profit if community is strong (less common than early thousands)

playbook.volumeRule: Volume 30‚Äì100% of MC is VERY good

slippage.note: Bounce slippage depending on the coin

execution.reEntry: Usually one entry unless coin is explosive; re-buying depends on the coin‚Äôs behavior

profitTakingExamplesFromMembers.explosiveCoins: Sell 60% and keep 40% until chart slows

beginnerRiskRules: If you're new, exit at your entry if it comes back - don't wait for profit
Never let a coin drop 50% on you. Do that on multiple coins and you'll lose everything
If entry keeps dropping, don't run on hopium; cut the loss or wait for better entry

chartMindset.note: Not really unless you want to get technical, but it‚Äôs not necessary

axiomFilters.title: AXIOM FILTER IMPORT + SAFETY
instructions: Click Pulse tab (do not use Discover)
You will see: New Pairs, Final Stretch, Migrated
Open Filters > Import > paste JSON > Apply All

dynamicBC.rule: Turn Dynamic BC OFF on all three tabs
dynamicBC.reason: Dynamic BC coins are usually bundled rug charts

liquidity.title: LIQUIDITY & LP LOCK (EXIT SAFETY)
liquidity.content:
üíß **LIQUIDITY (LP) = THE EXIT**

Liquidity is the pool you trade against. If it's weak or controlled, you can get TRAPPED.

‚úÖ **WHAT GOOD LIQUIDITY LOOKS LIKE:**
1. **Enough LP for your size** - Buy/sell without massive price impact
2. **Steady volume** - Real buys + sells, not one-sided
3. **No obvious control** - LP not easily removable

üîí **WHAT "LP LOCK" MEANS:**
LP Lock = liquidity tokens are time-locked so dev can't pull liquidity instantly.

‚ö†Ô∏è **LP LOCK REDUCES RUG RISK - IT DOES NOT PREVENT DUMPS!**

rugpull.title: HOW TO SPOT A RUG PULL
rugpull.content:
üö® **RUG DETECTION CHECKLIST:**

1. **CHART PATTERN** - Healthy chart = heartbeat pattern (up, down, up). BAD chart = straight up then death drop.

2. **GLOBAL FEES vs MARKET CAP** - Must match! Example: 3 SOL fees = 20-40k MC. If they don't match = RUG.

3. **WALLET ANALYSIS:**
 ‚Ä¢ Check holder dates - All "1 month" old = BUNDLED WALLETS = RUG
 ‚Ä¢ All hold same amount of SOL = ONE PERSON = RUG
 ‚Ä¢ Look for fat clusters on bubble map

4. **BUBBLE MAP** - Should be dispersed. If it looks like DEATH STAR = RUG.

5. **LIQUIDITY** - Must have healthy liquidity. Zero liquidity = money gets LOCKED.

‚ö†Ô∏è ALWAYS CHECK: Fees, Wallets, Dates, Bubble Map, Liquidity

goodcoin.title: HOW TO SPOT A GOOD COIN
goodcoin.content:
‚úÖ **GOOD COIN CHECKLIST:**

1. **HEALTHY CHART** - Starts low, builds, continues up (not straight up/down)

2. **FEES MATCH MC** - Proper relationship between fees and market cap

3. **DECENT LIQUIDITY** - Must have good liquidity for entry/exit

4. **VOLUME** - Look for **200+ buys on 5-minute chart**. More buys = more interest.

5. **WALLET DISTRIBUTION:**
 ‚Ä¢ Different wallet ages (not all "1 month")
 ‚Ä¢ Different SOL holdings
 ‚Ä¢ Nobody holds >4% (3% okay, 5%+ is risk)

6. **BUBBLE MAP** - Dispersed, not clustered. No fat whales.

7. **NARRATIVE** - Good memeable story that spreads naturally

8. **CA POSTED** - Contract Address in community = green flag

risk.title: RISK MANAGEMENT
risk.content:
üõ°Ô∏è **RISK RULES:**

1. **POSITION SIZE:** Risk only 1-5% per trade. NEVER go all-in.

2. **STOP LOSS:**
 ‚Ä¢ Once up 30-50%, set stop 3-10% above entry
 ‚Ä¢ Don't let losses go below -15% max
 ‚Ä¢ Cut red candles at entry FAST

3. **TAKING PROFITS:**
 ‚Ä¢ At 2x: Sell 50%
 ‚Ä¢ Every 30% up: Sell 20%
 ‚Ä¢ Big green candles: Sell 20%
 ‚Ä¢ Psychological levels (100k, 200k, 1M): Sell 20%

4. **NOT IN PROFIT?**
 ‚Ä¢ Sell aggressively on first red
 ‚Ä¢ Don't let it go under -15%

‚ö° This game is about PORT MANAGEMENT and STAYING IN THE GAME!

filters.title: AXIOM FILTER SETTINGS
filters.content:
üìä **NEW PAIRS FILTERS:**
‚Ä¢ Protocol: Pump.fun only
‚Ä¢ Dev holding: 5% max
‚Ä¢ Bundles: 40% max
‚Ä¢ Pro traders: 15%
‚Ä¢ MC: 5k min, Volume: 10k

üéØ **FINAL STRETCH:**
‚Ä¢ Volume: 30k
‚Ä¢ MC: 20k
‚Ä¢ Top 10 holders: 40%
‚Ä¢ 200+ buys on 5min chart

These filters keep you safe!

workflow.title: APE ‚Üí SCAN ‚Üí WATCH WORKFLOW
workflow.content:
üéØ **TRADING STAGES:**

**APE** - Caller bought in
‚Ä¢ Entry taken
‚Ä¢ Now monitoring

**SCAN** - Analyzing coin
‚Ä¢ Hasn't bought yet
‚Ä¢ Checking chart/wallets
‚Ä¢ Looking at bubble map

**WATCH** - Looking for dip
‚Ä¢ Coin looks good
‚Ä¢ Waiting for entry
‚Ä¢ Ready to ape on dip

ca.title: WHAT IS CA?
ca.content:
üìç **CA = CONTRACT ADDRESS**

The EXACT unique identifier for a token.

**HOW TO USE:**
1. Copy the CA
2. Paste into Axiom/DEX
3. Finds exact coin

**WHY IT MATTERS:**
‚Ä¢ Many coins have similar names
‚Ä¢ CA guarantees RIGHT coin
‚Ä¢ Prevents fake/scam versions

Always verify CA in community!

settings.title: BUY/SELL SETTINGS
settings.content:
‚öôÔ∏è **TRADING SETTINGS:**

**SLIPPAGE:** 10-30% (typically 15%)

**FEES:** Always keep extra SOL for fees

**BUY SETTINGS:**
‚Ä¢ Set max entry amount
‚Ä¢ Use limit orders when possible

**SELL SETTINGS:**
‚Ä¢ Set stop loss
‚Ä¢ Take profit targets
‚Ä¢ Scale out strategy

bundles.title: BUNDLED WALLETS
bundles.content:
‚ö†Ô∏è **BUNDLE DETECTION:**

**WHAT ARE BUNDLES?**
Multiple wallets controlled by ONE person to fake activity.

**HOW TO SPOT:**
‚Ä¢ All wallets same age
‚Ä¢ Hold same SOL amounts
‚Ä¢ Death star bubble map
‚Ä¢ 3-ring symbol on trades

**WHY IT MATTERS:**
Bundled coins = RUG WAITING TO HAPPEN

Always check wallet dates and amounts!

volume.title: VOLUME ANALYSIS
volume.content:
üìä **VOLUME MATTERS:**

**WHAT TO LOOK FOR:**
‚Ä¢ 200+ buys on 5min chart = STRONG
‚Ä¢ Volume matching MC = REAL
‚Ä¢ Consistent volume = HEALTHY
‚Ä¢ Volume spikes = ATTENTION

**ON PADRE:**
Check volume indicators for confirmation

**ON AXIOM:**
Use volume filters to find active coins

Volume = Truth. No volume = No interest.

referrals.title: PLATFORM REFERRAL LINKS
referrals.content:
üîó **TRADER U PLATFORM LINKS:**

**AXIOM (Main Platform):**
Best for beginners, clean interface, mobile friendly

**NOVA (Advanced):**
25% fee cashback, for experienced traders

**PADRE (Terminal):**
Advanced terminal, pro traders only

üì± **MOBILE SETUP:**
1. Use Chrome browser
2. Go to Axiom link
3. Connect Phantom wallet
4. Start trading

üéØ "Cut your losers early, let your winners run." - Old wisdom.
‚ö° "Patience beats FOMO every time." - Wait for your setup.
üî• "Survive first, profit second." - Risk management wins.
üí™ "Study your trades. Every loss is a lesson." - Keep learning.

‚úÖ Verify CA is posted in community
warnings: ‚ö†Ô∏è DON'T buy the top - wait for dip
